verses.text: \w When|strong="G1161"\w* the \w morning|strong="G4405"\w* was \w come|strong="G1096"\w*, \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* of the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w took|strong="G2983"\w* \w counsel|strong="G4824"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w to|strong="G5620"\w* \w put|strong="G2289"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* to \w death|strong="G2289"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when they had \w bound|strong="G1210"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, they \w led|strong="G0520"\w* \add him\add* \w away|strong="G0520"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* to \w Pontius|strong="G4194"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* the \w governor|strong="G2232"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="G5119"\w* \w Judas|strong="G2455"\w*, which had \w betrayed|strong="G3860"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, when he \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he was \w condemned|strong="G2632"\w*, repented \w himself|strong="G3338"\w*, and brought \w again|strong="G0654"\w* the \w thirty|strong="G5144"\w* pieces of \w silver|strong="G0694"\w* to the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w*, I have \w sinned|strong="G0264"\w* in that I have \w betrayed|strong="G3860"\w* the \w innocent|strong="G0121"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w What|strong="G5101"\w* \add is that\add* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*? \w see|strong="G3700"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \add to that\add*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he cast \w down|strong="G4496"\w* the pieces of \w silver|strong="G0694"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w temple|strong="G3485"\w*, and \w departed|strong="G0402"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G0565"\w* and hanged \w himself|strong="G0519"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w took|strong="G2983"\w* the silver \w pieces|strong="G0694"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, It \w is|strong="G0906"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w lawful|strong="G1832"\w* for to \w put|strong="G0906"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w treasury|strong="G2878"\w*, \w because|strong="G1893"\w* it \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w price|strong="G5092"\w* of \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w took|strong="G2983"\w* \w counsel|strong="G4824"\w*, and \w bought|strong="G0059"\w* \w with|strong="G1537"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* the \w potter’s|strong="G2763"\w* \w field|strong="G0068"\w*, to \w bury|strong="G5027"\w* \w strangers|strong="G3581"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w field|strong="G0068"\w* was \w called|strong="G2564"\w*, The \w field|strong="G0068"\w* of \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*, \w unto|strong="G2193"\w* this \w day|strong="G4594"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* was \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w* that which was \w spoken|strong="G4483"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w Jeremy|strong="G2408"\w* the \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w took|strong="G2983"\w* \w the|strong="G0694"\w* \w thirty|strong="G5144"\w* pieces of \w silver|strong="G0694"\w*, the \w price|strong="G5092"\w* of him that was \w valued|strong="G5091"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* they of the \w children|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* did \w value|strong="G5091"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G0068"\w* \w potter’s|strong="G2763"\w* \w field|strong="G0068"\w*, \w as|strong="G2505"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w appointed|strong="G4929"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w before|strong="G1715"\w* the \w governor|strong="G2232"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w governor|strong="G2232"\w* \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Art|strong="G1488"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* the \w King|strong="G0935"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*? \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Thou|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w sayest|strong="G3004"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G1722"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* was \w accused|strong="G2723"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w*, he \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, Hearest \w thou|strong="G0191"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* how many \w things|strong="G4214"\w* they witness \w against|strong="G2649"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w never|strong="G3756"\w* \w a|strong="G1520"\w* \w word|strong="G4487"\w*; insomuch \w that|strong="G5620"\w* the \w governor|strong="G2232"\w* \w marvelled|strong="G2296"\w* \w greatly|strong="G3029"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w at|strong="G2596"\w* \add that\add* \w feast|strong="G1859"\w* the \w governor|strong="G2232"\w* was \w wont|strong="G1486"\w* to \w release|strong="G0630"\w* \w unto|strong="G1520"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w* a \w prisoner|strong="G1198"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* they \w would|strong="G2309"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w then|strong="G5119"\w* a \w notable|strong="G1978"\w* \w prisoner|strong="G1198"\w*, \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w Barabbas|strong="G0912"\w*.

Therefore \w when|strong="G3767"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* were gathered \w together|strong="G4863"\w*, \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Whom|strong="G5101"\w* will \w ye|strong="G2309"\w* that I \w release|strong="G0630"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*? \w Barabbas|strong="G0912"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* which is \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*?
\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he \w knew|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w envy|strong="G5355"\w* they had \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

¶ \w When|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* was set \w down|strong="G2521"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the judgment \w seat|strong="G0968"\w*, \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w* \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Have|strong="G3367"\w* \w thou|strong="G4671"\w* nothing to \w do|strong="G3367"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* just \w man|strong="G1342"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* I have \w suffered|strong="G3958"\w* many \w things|strong="G4183"\w* this \w day|strong="G4594"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* a \w dream|strong="G3677"\w* because \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* \w persuaded|strong="G3982"\w* the \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they should \w ask|strong="G0154"\w* \w Barabbas|strong="G0912"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w destroy|strong="G0622"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

The \w governor|strong="G2232"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Whether|strong="G5101"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* the \w twain|strong="G1417"\w* will \w ye|strong="G2309"\w* that I \w release|strong="G0630"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*? \w They|strong="G3588"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Barabbas|strong="G0912"\w*.

\w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w What|strong="G5101"\w* shall I \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* with \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* which is \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*? \add They\add* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* say \w unto|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, Let him be \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w governor|strong="G2232"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w*, \w Why|strong="G5101"\w*, \w what|strong="G1063"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w* hath he \w done|strong="G4160"\w*? \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* cried \w out|strong="G2896"\w* the \w more|strong="G4057"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, Let him be \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w*.

¶ \w When|strong="G1161"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he could \w prevail|strong="G5623"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \add that\add* \w rather|strong="G3123"\w* a \w tumult|strong="G2351"\w* was \w made|strong="G1096"\w*, he \w took|strong="G2983"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w*, and \w washed|strong="G0633"\w* \add his\add* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w before|strong="G0561"\w* the \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, I \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w innocent|strong="G0121"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* the \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* of \w this|strong="G5127"\w* just \w person|strong="G1342"\w*: \w see|strong="G3700"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \add to it\add*.

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w His|strong="G0846"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* \add be\add* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="G5119"\w* released \w he|strong="G0630"\w* \w Barabbas|strong="G0912"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* when he had \w scourged|strong="G5417"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, he \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* \add him\add* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* be \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* the \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w* of the \w governor|strong="G2232"\w* \w took|strong="G3880"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the common \w hall|strong="G4232"\w*, and \w gathered|strong="G4863"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* the \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w band|strong="G4686"\w* \add of soldiers\add*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w stripped|strong="G1562"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, and put \w on|strong="G4060"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* a \w scarlet|strong="G2847"\w* \w robe|strong="G5511"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* when they had \w platted|strong="G4120"\w* a \w crown|strong="G4735"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w thorns|strong="G0173"\w*, they \w put|strong="G2007"\w* \add it\add* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w head|strong="G2776"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w reed|strong="G2563"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* right \w hand|strong="G1188"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they bowed the \w knee|strong="G1120"\w* \w before|strong="G1715"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w mocked|strong="G1702"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Hail|strong="G5463"\w*, \w King|strong="G0935"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*!

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w spit|strong="G1716"\w* \w upon|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w took|strong="G2983"\w* the \w reed|strong="G2563"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w smote|strong="G5180"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* the \w head|strong="G2776"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w after|strong="G3753"\w* that they had \w mocked|strong="G1702"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, they \w took|strong="G1562"\w* the \w robe|strong="G5511"\w* \w off|strong="G1562"\w* from \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w put|strong="G1746"\w* his \w own|strong="G0846"\w* \w raiment|strong="G2440"\w* \w on|strong="G1746"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w led|strong="G0520"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w away|strong="G0520"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \add him\add*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* as they came \w out|strong="G1831"\w*, they \w found|strong="G2147"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* of \w Cyrene|strong="G2956"\w*, \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* by \w name|strong="G3686"\w*: \w him|strong="G5126"\w* they \w compelled|strong="G0029"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w bear|strong="G0142"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w cross|strong="G4716"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when they were \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* a \w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w Golgotha|strong="G1115"\w*, \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* to \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, a \w place|strong="G5117"\w* of a \w skull|strong="G2898"\w*,

¶ They \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w vinegar|strong="G3690"\w* to \w drink|strong="G4095"\w* \w mingled|strong="G3396"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w gall|strong="G5521"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* when he had \w tasted|strong="G1089"\w* \add thereof\add*, he \w would|strong="G2309"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w drink|strong="G4095"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w parted|strong="G1266"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w garments|strong="G2440"\w*, \w casting|strong="G0906"\w* \w lots|strong="G2819"\w*: \w that|strong="G2443"\w* it might be \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w* which was \w spoken|strong="G4483"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* the \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w*, They \w parted|strong="G1266"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w garments|strong="G2440"\w* among \w them|strong="G1438"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w vesture|strong="G2441"\w* did they \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \w lots|strong="G2819"\w*.
\w And|strong="G2532"\w* sitting \w down|strong="G2521"\w* they \w watched|strong="G5083"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* set \w up|strong="G2007"\w* \w over|strong="G1883"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w head|strong="G2776"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w accusation|strong="G0156"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, \w THIS|strong="G3778"\w* \w IS|strong="G2076"\w* \w JESUS|strong="G2424"\w* THE \w KING|strong="G0935"\w* OF THE \w JEWS|strong="G2453"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* were \w there|strong="G4717"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w thieves|strong="G3027"\w* crucified \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w on|strong="G1537"\w* the right \w hand|strong="G1188"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w another|strong="G1520"\w* \w on|strong="G1537"\w* the \w left|strong="G2176"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* they that passed \w by|strong="G3899"\w* \w reviled|strong="G0987"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w wagging|strong="G2795"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w heads|strong="G2776"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, Thou that \w destroyest|strong="G2647"\w* the \w temple|strong="G3485"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w buildest|strong="G3618"\w* \add it\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, \w save|strong="G4982"\w* \w thyself|strong="G4572"\w*. \w If|strong="G1487"\w* thou \w be|strong="G1488"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, come \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w cross|strong="G4716"\w*.

\w Likewise|strong="G3668"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w mocking|strong="G1702"\w* \add him\add*, \w with|strong="G3326"\w* the \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w*, \w said|strong="G3004"\w*,

He \w saved|strong="G4982"\w* \w others|strong="G0243"\w*; \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w he|strong="G1410"\w* \w cannot|strong="G3756"\w* \w save|strong="G4982"\w*. \w If|strong="G1487"\w* he \w be|strong="G2076"\w* the \w King|strong="G0935"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*, let \w him|strong="G2597"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* come \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w cross|strong="G4716"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* we will \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

He \w trusted|strong="G3982"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; let him \w deliver|strong="G4506"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* he will \w have|strong="G2309"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, I \w am|strong="G1510"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

The \w thieves|strong="G3027"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, which were crucified \w with|strong="G4957"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w cast|strong="G3679"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* in \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w teeth|strong="G3679"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w sixth|strong="G1623"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* there \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w land|strong="G1093"\w* \w unto|strong="G2193"\w* the \w ninth|strong="G1766"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w*.
